snippet: Lawmakers of one of Israel’s most stalwart allies are telling Israel that it needs to work harder toward a peace agreement.
abstract: Editorial contends Israel should take heed of vote in Great Britain's House of Commons endorsing diplomatic recognition of Palestinian state; holds while vote is nonbinding, it expresses frustration many in England and elsewhere are feeling over Israel's continued expansion of settlements in Palestinian territory and failure to commit to serious peace negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers of one of Israel’s most stalwart allies are telling Israel that it needs to work harder toward a peace agreement.
